Name: SFC Talon
Description:
SFC Talon, the official app of the Santa Fe Christian Eagles, brings fans closer to their teams than ever before. Get In-Game Scoring, Dynamic Player Profiles, Game Previews & Recaps, Postgame Highlights, Customized Game Alerts and much more! Follow the Eagles all season long on your mobile device!

SFC Talon App Features Include:
• Post-Game Video Highlights
• Full Season Schedules
• Photo & Video Galleries
• Breaking News
• Sport & Level Specific Notifications
• Team Rosters & Player Profiles
• Livestream on Demand 
• Team Twitter, Instagram & Facebook Feeds
• In-Game scoring

Name: Super Santa Run - Play For Real Presents
Description:
Christmas Eve is here and it’s your job to make sure Super Santa gets all the presents delivered safely. You and Santa will journey through treacherous lands fighting off villains while throwing snowballs and riding in the sleigh. Play each day to win real presents. Compete with friends by tracking their high score by logging into the Game Center. 

This is no easy task for you or Santa make sure you spend some time getting familiar with the different features and controls.

Name: Santa Fe Catholic High School
Description: For over 50 years, students have been coming to Santa Fe Catholic High School to grow academically, spiritually and personally. From our very first graduating class to our most recent, we have been able to look with pride at the accomplishments of our alumni. Our students come to Santa Fe to learn and grow, and they leave ready to lead and succeed.

Name: I'm Santa Claus - High Fashion Makeup game
Description:
This year it is your turn to Santa Claus to give gifts to children, what will you dress up like?

How to play:
Touch the screen to enter the main interface, then you can select the dresses or pants, shoes and accessories for model. 

Features:
· Makeup Section 
· Dress up Section
